Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature and the Governor to support the continuation of New York’s Foreclosure Prevention Services Program in the 2012-2013 Executive Budget.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Support the continuation of New York’s Foreclosure Prevention Services Program in the 2012-2013 Executive Budget.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature and the Governor to enact legislation that would require the foreclosing party in a mortgage foreclosure action to produce the pooling and service agreement at the commencement of a mortgage foreclosure action.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require the foreclosing party in a mortgage foreclosure action to produce the pooling and service agreement at the commencement of a mortgage foreclosure action.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature and the Governor to enact legislation that would prohibit lenders from concealing mortgage assignments through the use of the Mortgage Electronic Registration System, Inc., known as MERS.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibit lenders from concealing mortgage assignments through the use of the Mortgage Electronic Registration System, Inc., known as MERS.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Federal Reserve Bank to rescind its proposed rule requiring borrowers to pay off the remaining principal on a mortgage before the lender is forced to cancel its security interest in the home.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Federal Reserve Bank to rescind its proposed rule requiring borrowers to pay off the remaining principal on a mortgage before the lender is forced to cancel its security interest in the home.

Items.Title: Oversight - Systemic Problems in the Ongoing Mortgage Foreclosure Crisis, and its Effect On New York City Neighborhoods.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Systemic Problems in the Ongoing Mortgage Foreclosure Crisis, and its Effect On New York City Neighborhoods.

Items.Title: Oversight - Systemic Problems in the Ongoing Mortgage Foreclosure Crisis, and its Effect On New York City Neighborhoods.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Systemic Problems in the Ongoing Mortgage Foreclosure Crisis, and its Effect On New York City Neighborhoods.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to codify subdivision (f) of section 202.12-a of the Uniform Rules for the New York State Trial Courts, addressing the accuracy of filings in residential mortgage foreclosure actions.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Uniform Rules for the NYS Trial Courts, addressing the accuracy of filings in residential mortgage foreclosure actions.
